mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ifs_hosiptal_info where esb_link_stcd_mid = 'N' LIMIT 100
SELECT * FROM ifs_hosiptal_info where esb_link_stcd_mid = 'N' LIMIT 10
select * from ifs_hosiptal_info where esb_link_stcd_mid='N' and encryption_symbol = 'JDQ4MTYyMiM1MSMkMSMkMCMkNzIkNTgxMzUxIzMxIyQyIyQ3IyQwMCQyNjE4MzIjNTEjJDEjJDYjJDgz'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ifr2_hosiptal_info (encryption_symbol, nursing_agency_name, category_code, category_code_name, sido_code, sido_code_name, sigungu_code, sigungu_code_name, eupmyeondong_name, zip_code, address, phone_number, homepage_url, opening_date, total_doctor, latitude, longtitude) VALUES (#{encryption_symbol}, #{nursing_agency_name}, #{category_code}, #{category_code_name}, #{sido_code}, #{sido_code_name}, #{sigungu_code}, #{sigungu_code_name}, #{eupmyeondong_name}, #{zip_code}, #{address}, #{phone_number}, #{homepage_url}, #{opening_date}, #{total_doctor}, #{latitude}, #{longtitude})
mapper.update: UPDATE ifs_hosiptal_info SET esb_link_stcd_mid='S' where encryption_symbol=#{encryption_symbol}
